---
title: "Wordle"
format: html
runtime: shiny
---

```{r}
library(shiny)

# Define URLs
d <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/difiore/ada-datasets/refs/heads/main/collins-scrabble-words-2019.txt"
s <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/difiore/ada-datasets/refs/heads/main/google-10000-english-usa-no-swears.txt"

load_dictionary <- function(filename) {
  table <- read.table(filename, header=TRUE)
  as.vector(table[,1])
}

valid_list <- toupper(load_dictionary(d))
solution_list <- toupper(load_dictionary(s))
valid_solution_list <- intersect(solution_list, valid_list)
pick_solution <- Filter(function(x) nchar(x) == 5, valid_solution_list)

# Reactive values
solution <- reactiveVal(sample(pick_solution, 1))
attempts_left <- reactiveVal(6)
letters_left <- reactiveVal(LETTERS)

# Legend output (static explanation)
output$legend <- renderText({
  paste(
    "*  = correct letter in correct position",
    "+  = correct letter in wrong position",
    "-  = letter not in the word",
    sep = "\n"
  )
})
```

## Enter Your Guess

```{r}
textInput("guess", "Enter a 5-letter word:")
```

```{r}
actionButton("submit", "Submit Guess")
```

## Game Output

```{r}
verbatimTextOutput("feedback")
verbatimTextOutput("letters")
verbatimTextOutput("attempts")
```

## Symbol Guide

```{r}
verbatimTextOutput("legend")
```

```{r}
observeEvent(input$submit, {

  guess <- toupper(input$guess)

  if (nchar(guess) != 5 || !(guess %in% valid_list)) {
    output$feedback <- renderText("Invalid word. Try again.")
    return()
  }

  sol_split <- strsplit(solution(), "")[[1]]
  guess_split <- strsplit(guess, "")[[1]]
  feedback <- rep("-", 5)

  for (j in 1:5) {
    if (guess_split[j] == sol_split[j]) {
      feedback[j] <- "*"
    } else if (guess_split[j] %in% sol_split) {
      feedback[j] <- "+"
    }
  }

  attempts_left(attempts_left() - 1)
  letters_left(setdiff(letters_left(), guess_split))

  if (guess == solution()) {
    output$feedback <- renderText("Correct! You won!")
  } else if (attempts_left() == 0) {
    output$feedback <- renderText(
      paste("Game Over. The word was:", solution())
    )
  } else {
    output$feedback <- renderText(
      paste("Feedback:", paste(feedback, collapse=" "))
    )
  }

  output$letters <- renderText(
    paste("Letters left:", paste(letters_left(), collapse=" "))
  )

  output$attempts <- renderText(
    paste("Attempts remaining:", attempts_left())
  )
})
```
